fullplot: Pregnant forensic psychologist Lydie Crane is hired to learn the truth behind the case of 16-year-old Stephanie Daley, who is accused of concealing her pregnancy and murdering her infant.
plot: Pregnant forensic psychologist Lydie Crane is hired to learn the truth behind the case of 16-year-old Stephanie Daley, who is accused of concealing her pregnancy and murdering her infant.
title: Stephanie Daley

tomatoes.consensus: The premise has all the trappings of melodrama, but the excellent performances give the characters complexity and empathy.
